com.goinstant.auth

Interface Group

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlainGroup

    public interface Group
    Groups are used by GoInstant to enforce ACLs. For more information on groups, please see the GoInstant guide on Creating and Managing ACLs See PlainGroup for a concrete implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getCustomClaims()
      Any additional properties about this group that should be included in the token.
      String getDisplayName()
      Display name for this group.
      String getID()
      Unique ID for this group.
